name: Dying Night SEX with ZOMBI
description:
A game for adults only. You are on an experimental station in space. You're doing research on ZOMBIE's sexuality.
You are the head of the project and are on an experimental space station with a few employees.
The staff includes academics and volunteer girls who love sex with zombies.
You conduct research to check the sexual preferences of zombies.
Strange conclusions start to come out during the research. You have to be careful...
All characters in the game are adults.
